definitions: a key fact, point, or idea to be remembered, typically one emerging from a discussion or meeting

examples.text: the main takeaway for me is that we need to continue to communicate all the things we're doing for our customers

shortDefinitions: key fact, point, or idea to be remembered

definitions: (in football and hockey) an act of regaining the ball or puck from the opposing team.
shortDefinitions: (in football and hockey) act of regaining ball or puck from opposing team

definitions: a restaurant selling cooked food to be eaten elsewhere; a takeout restaurant
shortDefinitions: restaurant selling cooked food to be eaten elsewhere

definitions: a meal or dish bought from a restaurant to be eaten elsewhere.
shortDefinitions: meal bought from restaurant to be eaten elsewhere
